attributes.action: Stop TFL and partners raising the rent in the railway arches extortionately.
attributes.additional_details: The government are always talking about how they want to save small businesses, well now is the chance to save many. Hundreds of small businesses are closing by the week. Thousands of people out of jobs. Businesses that sometimes have been there over 40 years and was being handed to the next generation, suddenly gone with a click of their fingers. Please make it so it is compulsory for them to dramatically lower their prices and keep us all in business.
attributes.background: Stop the extortionate raises. Lower them to a price where people can make it work they don’t have to throw all those years hard work down the drain.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
